item.title: A look under the hood of transfomers, the engine driving AI model evolution
item.description: How transformers work, why they are so important for the growth of scalable solutions and why they are the backbone of LLMs.

item.title: Researchers find you don’t need a ton of data to train LLMs for reasoning tasks
item.description: With a few hundred well-curated examples, an LLM can be trained for complex reasoning tasks that previously required thousands of instances.

item.title: ‘Personalized, unrestricted’ AI lab Nous Research launches first toggle-on reasoning model: DeepHermes-3
item.description: One DeepHermes-3 user reported a processing speed of 28.98 tokens per second on a MacBook Pro M4 Max consumer hardware.

item.title: Perplexity just made AI research crazy cheap—what that means for the industry
item.description: Perplexity's Deep Research tool matches $75,000/month enterprise AI capabilities, forcing OpenAI and Google to justify premium pricing.

item.title: AI’s biggest obstacle? Data reliability. Astronomer’s new platform tackles the challenge
item.description: Astronomer launches Astro Observe, an AI-powered data observability platform that combines orchestration and monitoring.
